Single site groundwater level plots and tables

Source: R/gwl_single_sites.R
gwl_plot_field.Rd

Function to create the field groundwater level data plot.

gwl_plot_field(
  gwl_data,
  plot_title = "",
  date_col = "lev_dt",
  value_col = "sl_lev_va",
  approved_col = "lev_age_cd",
  flip_y = TRUE
)

gwl_plot_all(
  gw_level_dv,
  gwl_data,
  date_col,
  value_col,
  approved_col,
  y_label = "GWL",
  plot_title = "",
  add_trend = FALSE,
  flip_y = FALSE
)

Arguments

gwl_data

data frame returned from dataRetrieval::readNWISgwl
plot_title

character
date_col

name of date column. Default is "lev_dt".
value_col

name of value column. Default is "sl_lev_va".
approved_col

name of column to get provisional/approved status. Default is "lev_age_cd".
flip_y

logical. If TRUE, flips the y axis so that the smallest number is on top. Default is TRUE.
gw_level_dv

daily value groundwater levels. Must include columns specified in date_col, value_col, and approved_col.
y_label

character for y-axis label. Consider using readNWISpCode for USGS parameter_nm.
add_trend

logical. Uses kendell_test_5_20_years.

Examples


# site <- "263819081585801"
# gwl_data <- dataRetrieval::readNWISgwl(site)

# Using package example data:
gwl_data <- L2701_example_data$Discrete
plot_title <- attr(gwl_data, "siteInfo")[["station_nm"]]
gwl_plot_field(gwl_data, plot_title, flip_y = FALSE)

# site <- "263819081585801"
parameterCd <- "62610"
# statCd <- "00001"
# gw_level_dv <- dataRetrieval::readNWISdv(site, parameterCd, statCd = statCd)
# Using package example data:
gw_level_dv <- L2701_example_data$Daily
gwl_data <- L2701_example_data$Discrete
plot_title <- attr(gwl_data, "siteInfo")[["station_nm"]]

y_label <- dataRetrieval::readNWISpCode(parameterCd)$parameter_nm

date_col = "Date"
value_col = "X_62610_00001"
approved_col = "X_62610_00001_cd"

gwl_plot_all(gw_level_dv, 
             NULL, 
             date_col = date_col, 
             value_col = value_col,
             approved_col = approved_col,
             plot_title, flip_y = FALSE) 


date_col = c("Date", "lev_dt")
value_col = c("X_62610_00001", "sl_lev_va")
approved_col = c("X_62610_00001_cd", "lev_age_cd") 

gwl_plot_all(gw_level_dv, 
             gwl_data, 
             date_col = date_col, 
             value_col = value_col,
             approved_col = approved_col,
             plot_title,
             add_trend = TRUE)

             
gwl_plot_all(NULL, 
             gwl_data, 
             date_col = "lev_dt", 
             value_col = "sl_lev_va",
             approved_col = "lev_age_cd",
             plot_title)
